name: Freunde der Interaktion GmbH
description:
We are an interdisciplinary UX / UI Design and Software Development team that shares the passion for user-friendly iPhone, iPad and Mac apps. Together, we have already successfully integrated several small and large projects into the App Store.
As a service provider, we create apps from the conception to the finished product.
Our flexibility and localization allow us to work directly with the customer and to carry out assignments all over the world.
